text:
Hey :wave: Not sure if this is the right channel to ask this or not..
I am wondering whether using export pages and importing to another site carry across links within the page? E.g. I have built a site on a sandbox account with custom templates + pages. I have modules within those templates which include links to other pages, if I export them from the sandbox will they be intact on the new account? Thanks! :tada:

Hi, I am migrate blog posts from Wordpress to HubSpot which is a nightmare… is there anyway a editor can easily add a class to an image in the content area of a blog with out going to source view? In the Wordpress blog we have a number of different style for different images but in HubSpot once an image in added to a blog the only options are positioning and adding alt…. i need to add a class
